card.title: Fractal
card.text: This is a program that draws fractal.

card.title: ISBN Management System
card.text: This is a web page that you can save ISBN of the books you read.

card.title: 10 Fast Fingers Music Game Ver.
card.text: This is a music game imitating a typing game which is called 10 Fast Fingers.

card.title: Taiko Editor
card.text: This is a system that you can make tja file physically. All you have to do is to put magnets on this system.

card.title: Card List
card.text: This is a web page that you can see the card list I created.

card.title: English Diary
card.text: This is a web log system that you have to use one specific English word to improve your vocabulary.

card.title: Solt Particles
card.text: This is a program to draw a lot of particles.

card.title: Golf Game
card.text: This is a simple golf game. This is very funny.

card.title: TOEIC Editor
card.text: This is a web page that you can make your TOEIC part 5 questions easily and share them with your Twitter account.

card.title: Tubeat
card.text: This is a music game with button controller. You can play this game with Twitter like function.

card.title: Solt Cube
card.text: This is a 3D web page which shows many cubes.

card.title: SOLT9029
card.text: This is my home page. I didn't use any CSS frameworks in this page.

card.title: Sand Game
card.text: Sand come from the top of the window. You can draw lines to change the movement of sand.

card.title: Pitagora
card.text: This is a program of pitagora simulator.

card.title: TOEIC Study Group LINE Bot
card.text: This is a LINE bot. You can learn English.

card.title: Rotating Music Game
card.text: This is a music game that automatically rotates when you make a mistake.

card.title: TOEIC Generator
card.text: This is a generator that you can make questions by posting images.
